name: Searching for father
description:
Something strange was discovered in the corner of a mine, something deep and filled with monsters. Your father, one of the miners, has decided to explore further and has yet to return. Thankfully, you, his daughter, is a axe and dagger wielding, 20 foot jumping, badass of a little girl. You venture down in to the mine, and in to the tunnels beyond to search for him.

A - move Left

D - move Left

SPACE - Jump

LeftMouse - Melee

RightMouse - Bow
